name: Cin Cin Bar & Lounge
description: Pronounced 'Chin Chin' — the Italian toast to good health, old friends, and the pleasure of wine. Cin Cin offers an extensive artisan cocktail program unlike any other Reno nightclub. Watch as artisan bartenders create classic and creative concoctions using only the finest spirits and ingredients, from fresh-squeezed juices to hand-muddled fruit, herbs, and vegetables for a truly memorable experience.
shortDescription: Upscale artisan cocktail lounge with Italian flair and handcrafted drinks at the Eldorado.

faqs.question: What does Cin Cin mean?
faqs.answer: Pronounced 'Chin Chin,' it's the Italian toast to good health, old friends, and the pleasure of wine.

faqs.question: What's special about the cocktails?
faqs.answer: Artisan bartenders use fresh-squeezed juices, hand-muddled fruit, herbs, and vegetables with the finest spirits.

faqs.question: Is Cin Cin open every day?
faqs.answer: Yes, seven days a week from 4:30pm to close.

meta.title: Cin Cin Bar & Lounge – Artisan Cocktails at Eldorado Reno | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Experience artisan cocktails with fresh-squeezed juices and hand-muddled ingredients at Cin Cin Bar & Lounge in Eldorado Reno.
